alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 5:36PM EDT until March 27 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 145 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 535 PM EDT, Minor flooding is occurring along the little Muskingum River at Bloomfield as a result of heavier rains earlier in the day. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Washington County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
